name: Oliver The Companion
description:
This is a prototype I made for a possible game titled "Oliver The Companion." Play as Oliver, an android from a dystopian universe whose main purpose in life is to help people in need and make friends. This game was created for the Low Rez Jam (April 2016). Special thanks to Jonathan Pangle (Supersysscvi) for guiding me and Brandon Harrold (Brando Nut Muffin) for the soundtrack.

Controls:

Space to Interact

Left, Right, Up, Down to walk

c to check inventory
